name: ConsulTech Technologieberatung GmbH
goal: ConsulTech's goal is to support its clients (SMEs, large companies and research institutions) in receiving grants from national (German, UK, USA) and European institutions. ConsulTech is specialized on projects relevant to pharmaceutical, biotech and medtech stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: ConsulTech's goal is to facilitate access to funding options for research and development projects relevant to  pharmaceutical, biotech and medtech stakeholders in particular SMEs and mid-sized companies by proposing research topics that might be supported by the EC.
